historyItem.sql: SELECT SUBSTR(RESERV_NO,0,6) 매출월 ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0001',SALES),0)) SPECIAL_SET ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0002',SALES),0)) PASTA ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0003',SALES),0)) PIZZA ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0004',SALES),0)) SEA_FOOD ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0005',SALES),0)) STEAK ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0006',SALES),0)) SALAD_BAR ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0007',SALES),0)) SALAD ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0008',SALES),0)) SANDWICH ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0009',SALES),0)) WINE ,SUM(NVL(DECODE(ITEM_ID,'M0010',SALES),0)) JUICE FROM ORDER_INFO GROUP BY SUBSTR(RESERV_NO,0,6) ORDER BY 1;
